title: Warlock Spells
content:
can't move, act or react. Attacks from within 3m are always Critical Hits.

18m WIS Save Concentration

Disguise up to 4 members of your adventuring party.

Throw a creature or object up to 18m with a thought. Once per turn, you can use Telekinesis again without expending a spell slot.

8~48 Damage8d6 NecroticSculpt a massive sphere of entropic energy around a creature. Devastate the target and all surrounding creatures.
